column4: good morning (EST) fellow ubuntu-ers :)    is any one aware of the new sed package for hoary being broken?
No `START-INFO-DIR-ENTRY' and no `This file documents'. \ install-info(/usr/share/info/sed.info): unable to determine description for `dir' entry - giving up
I have added a line in dir for sed to make it look like a working one... but no luck.
